data.persona: I am provided a special place to sleep. I may be tired after my travels. I am furnished with warm hospitality and a good meal.
data.description:
You are in the sitting room.
the sitting room has a goat's skin as a sitting place in front of the cottage's fireplace that is just a fire burning in a pit. It is incredibly small
There's a plate and a blanket here.
The traveler is here.

You are carrying a Handkerchief, a purse, a flower, and a lace handkerchief, and wearing a shoes.

data.mid_motivation: I am preparing for bed and relaxing with the traveler
data.long_motivation: I hope to explore the kingdom before I head back to my home
